content.rendered:
• Customer Reviews: 
    4.1 out of 5 stars    1,685 ratings

excerpt.rendered: Parry’s Spirulina is a 100% Organic, non-GMO certified micro-algal superfood trusted by consumers in over 40 countries. One of the richest composite natural source of phytonutrients, vegan protein and antioxidants, Spirulina will help you fill vital nutritional gaps to build & strengthen immunity and to enjoy better health every day.
